name: SKCloudServiceController
desc: An object that determines the current capabilities of the user’s music library.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> SKCloudServiceAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns the type of authorization the user has set for accessing the music library on the device.

items.name: class func requestAuthorization((SKCloudServiceAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the user for permission to access the music library on the device.

items.name: enum SKCloudServiceAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of authorization the user has set for accessing the music library.

items.name: func requestUserToken(forDeveloperToken: String, completionHandler: (String?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Returns a user token that you use to access personalized Apple Music content.

items.name: func requestStorefrontCountryCode(completionHandler: (String?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Gets the country code for the storefront associated with a user's iTunes account.

items.name: func requestCapabilities(completionHandler: (SKCloudServiceCapability, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Gets the current capabilities associated with the music library on the device.

items.name: struct SKCloudServiceCapability
items.desc: Constants that specify the current capabilities of the user’s music library on the device.

items.name: static let SKStorefrontIdentifierDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification name for indicating a change in the storefront identifier associated with the device.

items.name: static let SKCloudServiceCapabilitiesDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification name for indicating a change in the capabilities associated with the music library on the device.

items.name: static let SKStorefrontCountryCodeDidChange: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification name for indicating a change in the storefront country or region code associated with the device.
